short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces Valentines day posts from imgur with the money cat...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's valentine's day season for the internet. If you just broke up with someone, and don't want to see posts with valentine's day in them on imgur use this plugin. It will replace the text and image with a cat.
